title: Staying Motivated
milestoneGoal: What’s important to you and how does this affect choices in your day to day life? What does it mean for your job search? Let’s discuss.

content.content: Choose one of these activities to get started on your Staying Motivated milestone:
Finding the right job for you can take time. We’ll give you tips for staying motivated, even when the going gets tough.

content.subheading: Finding a job can seem like all or nothing — either you’ve landed a job or you haven’t. Everything in the middle is uncertainty:
items: Seeing if someone has a connection at a company you’re interested in
Finding an accountant to help with your taxes
Getting advice on whether to attend a conference
Sharing a job posting that looks like a good fit for someone you know

content.content: Staying motivated is about moving forward in the face of these questions. It’s not easy, for sure. But it’s possible, and we’re here to help.

content.heading: Focus on little steps.
content.subheading: It’s normal to get overwhelmed when you have a big goal like landing a job. Decide what you can get done in the next hour and then do it.

content.heading: Look for inspiration.
content.subheading: Maybe today you need to find a job, any job. But make time to figure out what work you’d really like to do, too. Having a long-term goal can give you a sense of purpose.

content.heading: Commit to learning from this experience.
content.subheading: Many things about a job search, like the job market itself, aren’t in your control. You can take charge of how you approach the search, and signing up for a tool like NJCN is a good step.
